name: Funky Hoops Basketball
description:
Get Funky Hoops Basketball now for:

HIGH FLYING, SUPER SLAM DUNKING, FAST BREAKING, SHOT BLOCKING,
3 POINT SHOOTING, ALLEY OOPING, 3D BASKETBALL ACTION

Right on your iPhone or iPad!

Features:

12 unique Funky Players,
6 uniquely skilled teams
Tutorial, QuickPlay, League Modes
12, 18, and 24 points games
Easy, Medium, and Hard Difficulty
2 Camera Views
